author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Demo Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Hounded, a third-person cinematic dog adventure game developed by Imprint Studios. Players will assume control of a lively Border Collie named Duke in search of the leader of the Rebellion and his loyal master. Track his scent and make use of the power of the Tide in Hounded, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#Hounded #Gaming #IGN
title: Hounded - Official Demo Gameplay Reveal Trailer

description:
Moblins, Bokoblins, and Lynels oh my! Check out gameplay of Princess Zelda and Rauru absolutley bullying a bunch of Moblins and other enemies under a blood moon during the Striking North mission from Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment.

#HyruleWarriorsAgeOfImprisonment #TheLegendOfZelda #Gaming
title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment - 16 Minutes of Zelda Blood Moon Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
GTA 6 has been delayed again. Yes, Rockstar has pushed back Grand Theft Auto’s return to its Miami-inspired setting of Vice City to November 19, 2026. Although this is tough to take, this announcement isn’t necessarily bad news for everyone. So, let’s see who may profit and who might take a hit from Grand Theft Auto 6’s latest change of date.

#IGN #gaming #gta6
title: The Winners and Losers of the GTA 6 Delay

author: IGN
description:
Contraband Police is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X/S. It is also available on PC. Get another look at Contraband Police in this console launch trailer, and see what some critics are saying about the action-adventure sim. Take over the duties of a border guard inspector in a communist country of the 80's. Smuggling, corruption and forgery are the order of the day here. Be vigilant and earn the respect of your superiors.

#IGN #gaming
title: Contraband Police - Official Console Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair trailer for this upcoming action crime thriller film. Quentin Tarantino’s Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair unites Volume 1 and Volume 2 into a single, unrated epic—presented exactly as he intended, complete with a new, never-before-seen anime sequence. Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair arrives exclusively in theaters December 5, 2025.

Uma Thurman stars as The Bride, left for dead after her former boss and lover Bill ambushes her wedding rehearsal, shooting her in the head and stealing her unborn child. To exact her vengeance, she must first hunt down the four remaining members of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad before confronting Bill himself. 

With its operatic scope, relentless action, and iconic style, The Whole Bloody Affair stands as one of cinema’s definitive revenge sagas—rarely shown in its complete form, and now presented with a classic intermission.

Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair stars Uma Thurman, Lucy Liu, Viv
title: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair - Official Trailer (2025) Uma Thurman

author: IGN
description:
Dark Deity 2 is available now on Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5 (PS5). It is also available on Steam and Nintendo Switch. Watch the Dark Deity 2 launch trailer for this tactical RPG sequel game. Set 25 years after the events of Dark Deity, the sequel returns players to the war-torn realm of Verroa, where the Eternal Order once restored peace—but a new empire now seeks to claim it.

#IGN #gaming
title: Dark Deity 2 - Official PlayStation 5 & Xbox Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops is a decades-spanning tale of deception, betrayal, and questionable psychiatry. It’s just one of CoD’s several separate subseries, but it’s by far the beefiest.

Back in 2010, it would have been easy for developer Treyarch to whip up some jungle assets and ship Call of Duty 7: Vietnam, but instead it unleashed a sprawling techno-thriller with all-you-can-eat acronyms in which half of the characters are hallucinations and the rest are historical figures up to no good. 

Black Ops is where Call of Duty gets weird– a stylish head trip with plot twists to spare. There’s a century’s worth of storyline in this epic espionage saga with more on the way, so consider this your pre-mission briefing ahead of Black Ops 7. Here is everything you need to know about the Black Ops story so far.

#IGN #CallOfDuty #BlackOpsStory
title: The Whole Call of Duty: Black Ops Timeline So Far

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Twilight's End' 2025 Season 3 Cinematic Trailer for League of Legends, the hit action team-based MOBA developed by Riot Games. 

Players will get a glimpse of a time long before the modern era, when Zaahen made a choice, and now Xin Zhao must make his own in “Twilight’s End.” Explore 'Twilight's End' 2025 Season 3 for League of Legends, available now for PC.

#IGN #LeagueOfLegends #TwilightsEnd
title: League of Legends - Official 'Twilight's End' 2025 Season 3 Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Streaming Now on Disney+' Trailer for Fire And Water: Making The Avatar Films, a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the Avatar films. Explore the process of developing Avatar: The Way of Water and a first look at the upcoming Avatar: Fire and Ash with Fire And Water: Making The Avatar Films, streaming now on Disney+.

The two-part documentary details the filmmaker's travels from Manhattan Beach, San Pedro, Shasta Lake, and the Channel Islands to the Bahamas, Hawaii, and New Zealand, to follow the cast and below-the-line team as they work to hone and perfect the techniques of underwater performance capture technology and learn to free dive in a massive, state-of-the-art 680,000-gallon water tank.

Fire And Water: Making The Avatar Films is streaming now exclusively on Disney+.

#IGN #Avatar #MakingOf
title: Fire And Water: Making The Avatar Films - Official 'Streaming Now on Disney+' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the PS5 Launch Trailer for The Awakener: Forgotten Oath, a medieval action roguelike game developed by Taner Games. 

Players will take on countless enemies in a magic-filled world of Sylvalond. Embody the Awakener summoned by the Twelve Gods of Therad in The Awakener: Forgotten Oath, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) alongside PC (Steam).

#IGN #AwakenerForgottenOath #PS5
title: The Awakener: Forgotten Oath - Official PS5 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a terrifying new look at Silent Breath in this latest trailer for the psychological game where every scream could be your last. The new Silent Breath trailer showcases the addition of a multiplayer mode and the gameplay you can expect. The multiplayer mode allows you to team up (or split up) with your friends in a tense co-op mode where silence is survival. Coordinate, whisper, and try not to panic—because in this world, trust kills faster than fear. 

Unpredictable horrors lurk around every corner, forcing you to find the missing people while desperately clinging to survival in Silent Breath. In this experience, even your own mind can become your enemy. Stay vigilant and keep your voice hushed, or risk becoming another victim of the forest's darkness. 

Silent Breath is out now in PC Early Access on Steam, and the free Multiplayer update is available now.

#IGN #SIlentBreath #Horror
title: Silent Breath - Official Multiplayer Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Echoes of Unfallen' Version 1.0 Release Trailer for Escape from Tarkov, the hit tactical extraction shooter developed by Battlestate Games. 

Players will deploy directly into the harsh battlegrounds to fight for loot, make key strategic decisions, and extract at all costs. Escape from Tarkov is launching into Version 1.0 on November 15 for PC (Steam).

#IGN #EscapeFromTarkov #ExtractionShooter
title: Escape from Tarkov - Official 'Echoes of Unfallen' Version 1.0 Release Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Game Modes Overview Trailer for My Hero Academia: All's Justice, a third-person action superhero game based on the hit manga and anime series developed by Byking Inc. 

Players can interact with a host of different modes in the game, from the Story Mode, Team Up Missions, Archives Battle, and more. My Hero Academia: All's Justice is launching on February 6, 2026, for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #MyHeroAcademia #Action
title: My Hero Academia: All's Justice - Official Game Modes Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Mass Effect SSV Normandy SR1 Trailer for No Man's Sky, the hit sci-fi action-adventure exploration game developed by Hello Games. 

In honor of N7 Day, fans of the BioWare-developed RPG can embark on the Beachhead Expedition in No Man's Sky to claim the iconic SSV Normandy SR1 once again. 

Access the Beachhead Expedition to attain the Mass Effect SSV Normandy SR1 in No Man's Sky from November 7 through November 18 on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, macOS, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #NoMansSky #MassEffect
title: No Man' Sky x Mass Effect - Official SSV Normandy SR1 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Lou MagMell Character Trailer for Code Vein 2, an action souls-like RPG developed by Bandai Namco Studios. 

Players will explore an expansive world to battle powerful enemies and unfold a deep narrative. Take a look at the latest trailer to become acquainted with Lou MagMell, a dedicated Revenant who wields the ability to travel through time itself. Catch her in action in Code Vein 2, launching on January 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #CodeVein2 #Soulslike
title: Code Vein 2 - Official Lou MagMell Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the LEGO Marvel Avengers: Strange Tails trailer for this upcoming two-part animated series. LEGO Marvel Avengers: Strange Tails features the voices of Troy Baker as “Hawkeye,” Alia Shawkat as “Meryet,” James Mathis III as “Black Panther,” Mick Wingert as “Iron Man,” Roger Craig Smith as “Steve Rogers,” Laura Bailey as “Black Widow” and Jason Alexander as “Magneto.” LEGO Marvel Avengers: Strange Tails debuts exclusively on Disney+ on November 14.

Hawkeye and The Avengers have made saving the world look easy. But now they face their wildest threat yet: SOCIAL MEDIA. To save the world, a new team must be recruited to help our heroes contend with an influencer bent on cataclysmic destruction! 

The LEGO Marvel Avengers: Strange Tails series is directed by Ken Cunningham, written by Eugene Son & Henry Gilroy, and executive produced by Jason Cosler, Harrison Wilcox, Jill Wilfert, Keith Malone, Son and Gilroy.

#IGN  #LEGO #Avengers
title: LEGO Marvel Avengers: Strange Tails - Official Trailer (2025) Troy Baker, Roger Craig Smith

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at the revamped Canyons, a new post-apocalyptic sci-fi action game where you're exiled to the titular Canyons above a Crawler land ship, forced to survive by confronting a world where anything – ANYTHING – can come to life and be deadly. Wishlist Canyons on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2708860/Canyons/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Canyons: Official Re-Reveal Teaser

author: IGN
description:
Our review of Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment is live on IGN! The latest entry in Nintendo’s hack-and-slash Zelda spinoff series delivers fantastic gameplay, tons of content, and impressively stable performance on Switch 2. Unfortunately, it’s held back by a wildly disappointing story and one of Nintendo’s strangest embargoes yet. Here’s the full breakdown of what works, what doesn’t, and why it’s still worth your time.

00:00:00 - Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment
00:14:29 - Animal Crossing: New Horizons

#HyruleWarriors #Nintendo #Gaming
title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment: Review Discussion - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description: Grand Theft Auto 6 has been delayed yet again, this time from May 2026 to November 19th, 2026, but maybe thats a good thing? On this episode of GTFM Nick Limon sits down with Nick Maillet and Michael Higham break down what this means to you and why delaying GTA 6 might be a good thing. Stay tuned to GTFM for all things GTA 6.
title: Why the GTA 6 Delay Is a Good Thing | GTFM
